TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed StructureChangeType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Contains values that specify changes in the structure of the Microsoft UI Automation element tree.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType ChildAdded = int32(0)

Docs.summary: A child element was added to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType ChildRemoved = int32(1)

Docs.summary: A child element was removed from the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType ChildrenBulkAdded = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Child elements were added to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType ChildrenBulkRemoved = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Child elements were removed from the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType ChildrenInvalidated = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Child elements were invalidated in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree. This might mean that one or more children were added or removed, depending on the UI Automation providers implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType ChildrenReordered = int32(5)

Docs.summary: The order of the child elements in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree changed.
